name: Endless Runner (wanicdigipen)
description:
ENDLESS RUNNER

An endless runner set in the 90's techno future. You are a skateboarder moving on the rooftops of a generic city trying to avoid obstacles and pitfalls. Your goal is to set the highest record for the longest skateboarding marathon on rooftops.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Press Space to Jump. Don't fall off of the buildings and don't hit the drones.

CREDITS:
